issue.title: built-in label auto-skip doesn't work

repository.name: Chart.js
repository.description: Simple HTML5 Charts using the <canvas> tag

issue.body:
As title says, the built in label auto-skip doesn't remove overlapping labels

![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/550312/20214171/b89ac798-a80c-11e6-9629-0476eb7bdcfa.png)


http://codepen.io/anon/pen/ZBQMar?editors=1111

issue.title: built in skipRatio bug caused by previous commit

repository.name: Chart.js
repository.description: Simple HTML5 Charts using the <canvas> tag

issue.body:
As stated in the title, unfortunately, #2584 is interfering with issue #3583.

## Expected Behavior
Please refer to #3583 — The bar chart should use built in autoskip feature

## Current Behavior
Please refer to #3583 — for jsfiddle (basically the built-in autoskip not working here)

## Possible Solution
In issue #2584, it should check for `!isRotated`.
possible solution 
```javascript
var isRotated = me.labelRotation !== 0; 
var noRotations = !isRotated;
....
if (noRotations) {
    longestRotatedLabel /= 2; 
}
```
<!--- Not obligatory, but suggest a fix/reason for the bug, -->
<!--- or ideas how to implement the addition or change -->

## Environment
<!--- Include as many relevant details about the environment you experienced the bug in -->
* Chart.js version:
* Browser name and version:
* Relevant links: 

1. [#2584 in sourcecode](https://github.com/chartjs/Chart.js/blob/master/src/core/core.scale.js#L524-L528)

issue.title: Fixed built-in auto skip caused by previous commit (#3904)

repository.name: Chart.js
repository.description: Simple HTML5 Charts using the <canvas> tag

issue.body: Fix the issue where built-in auto skip feature wasn't working properly as stated in the title. Please review.
